allow: Bash(timeout 15 bash -c "while ! netstat -ano | findstr '':3000.*LISTENING'' > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; done; echo ''Server is ready''")
Bash(# Extract titles from Crime & Justice articles grep -l ''category: ""Crime & Justice""'' content/articles/*.mdx)
Bash(# Get all malformed files and their category lines git ls-files --others --exclude-standard content/articles/ | xargs grep -h ''category: "".*category:'')
Bash(# Check hexdump to see if there''s special character git ls-files --others --exclude-standard content/articles/ | xargs grep -h ""^category:"")
Bash(# Get all unique categories and test their slugs echo ""Testing category URLs..."" echo """" git ls-files --others --exclude-standard content/articles/ | xargs grep -h ""^category:"")
Bash(# Get unique categories and their slugs git ls-files --others --exclude-standard content/articles/ | xargs grep -h ""^category:"")

Bash(# Get ALL categories from both committed and new articles echo ""Checking ALL categories in the system..."" # Get categories from committed articles git ls-files content/articles/ | xargs grep -h ""^category:"")

Bash(# Fetch the categories page and extract category links echo ""Checking categories displayed on /categories page..."" echo """" # Get the categories page HTML and extract hrefs to category pages curl -s http://localhost:3000/categories)
Bash(# Final comprehensive test echo ""=== FINAL COMPREHENSIVE TEST ==="" echo """" # Fetch all category links from the page curl -s http://localhost:3000/categories)
